name: Bubblez: Bubble Defense Full
description:
Fond of bubble shooting games? Than play it in multiplayer mode! Make your way through 45 crazy arcade levels and get additional score every time you win!

Features:

- Multiplayer mode
- 45 challenging levels in full version
- Global leaderboard
- Multilingual interface

If you like bubble games, than there is no need to explain the rules of this fun free arcade. If you don't, than Bubblez: Bubble Defense will make you change your mind. This multiplayer bubble shooter is a perfect time-killer and a challenging game for all Match 3 and Marble Popper fans. Make the groups of 3 or more bubbles of the same color to clear the play field. Compete online in multiplayer mode and gain bonus score every time you win! With 45 impossible levels in full version Bubblez: Bubble Defense provides almost unlimited play time!

There's also iPad version of this game! Check the App Store!
